QueryResult.text: select 'x' pmd_analytical_partition_by, odf_sections.id odf_pk, odf_sections.SECTION_SEQUENCE sequence, odf_sections.CODE code, odf_sections.NAME name, UPDATED.FULL_NAME updated_by, ODF_SECTIONS.CREATED_DATE created_date, odf_ca_odf_section.partition_code partition_code, ODF_SECTIONS.LAST_UPDATED_DATE last_updated_date, CREATED.FULL_NAME created_by, odf_sections.BLUEPRINT_ID blueprint_id from odf_sections odf_sections, odf_blueprints odf_blueprints, srm_resources CREATED, srm_resources UPDATED, odf_ca_odf_section odf_ca_odf_section where 1 = 1 and odf_sections.blueprint_id = odf_blueprints.id and odf_sections.created_by = CREATED.user_id and odf_sections.last_updated_by = UPDATED.user_id and odf_sections.id = odf_ca_odf_section.id
